help-file.title: LINK LAG
help-file.content:
Many players have problems with their links to the game. This could be very dangerous to your health in the middle of combat. However, we at Duris feel it is unfair to place the responsibility for quality of the link on us. Thus, deaths and injury due to link loss are not our problem.
If your link freezes up for some reason, a god will usually be willing to release the link, letting you reconnect. If the system that runs the MUD itself freezes up, your character will not be harmed, as everything and everyone else in the game will also be frozen. However, if another system en route to this one lags, you will be put in a dangerous position and your character could die.
If the network looks shaky, don't put your character in a dangerous position, as we will NOT reimburse you for losses.
If your WIMPY toggle is enabled, you will automatically flee when your hit points reach the wimpy level.
